```{r}
library("rjson")
```

# Fetch prices
```{r}
# Look for files of interest
files <- list.files(path = "tmp", pattern = "*.json", full.names = TRUE)
stopifnot(length(files) > 0)
```

```{r}
extract <- function(f){
  paste("reading", f)
  raw = fromJSON(file = f)
  p <- c(); for (observation in raw$Data) p <- c(p, observation$close)
  p
}

prices <- as.data.frame(mapply(extract, files))
summary(prices)
```

# Linear regression
```{r}
for (y in prices) {

  x <- 1:length(y)
  relation <- lm(y ~ x)

  # relation
  plot(x, y, col = "green", main = "hi", 
    abline(relation, col="darkgreen"), xlab = "minutes", ylab = "USD")
}
```
